official-title.#text: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to permit insurers to offer catastrophic coverage plans to anyone, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text: Permitting insurers to offer catastrophic coverage plans to anyone

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1302(e) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:e

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: with respect to any plan year if the plan provides—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:d

text.#text: A health plan not providing a bronze, silver, gold, or platinum level of coverage shall be treated as meeting the requirements of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the essential health benefits determined under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:e/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , except that the plan provides no benefits for any plan year until the individual has incurred cost-sharing expenses in an amount equal to the annual limitation in effect under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:b

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for the plan year (except as provided for in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:c/p:1
Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:2713

text.#text: coverage for at least three primary care visits.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1302/ss:e

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1312(d)(3)(C) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:C

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

text.#text: The amendments made by this section shall be effective as if included in the enactment of the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3598 IH: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to permit insurers to offer catastrophic coverage plans to anyone, and for other purposes.
